All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    HelperMapFragment  
    MainActivity  
    MainFragment
    Main fragment for the app Acts as the home screen and main feed where all scans are delivered
    MapFragment  
    MyProfile
    The MyProfile class is the activity that is used to display the user's profile and their stats, when called, it will get the user's UID from auth, then get the user's data from the database, then get the QRCodes they have scanned and display the stats & information based on that data.
    MyProfileWorkflowTests  
    PhotoObject  
    PictureActivity  
    Player
    Class for representing a 'Player', i.e a user of the app
    PlayerListAdapter
    Class for defining a custom adapter for a ListView for player Searching
    PlayerProfileActivity
    Activity class to display searched Player profiles from SearchFragment.java
    PlayerTest
    Testing Class to test the player object These should always pass, if not theres a serious problem
    QRAPP  
    QRcAdapter
    Adapter for QRCode
    QRcAdapterTest
    Test the QRcAdapter
    QRCode
    QRCode class that holds the information for a QR code.
    QRCodeTest
    Test the QRCode class
    QRProfile  
    QRProfileTest  
    RankFragment  
    ResultsActivity
    ResultsActivity gets bundle from ScanActivity containing a SHA-256 hashed string of the barcode and long score value of the hash according to the scoring system.
    ResultsActivityTest  
    ScanActivity
    Scan activity uses CameraX and ML Kit to scan a barcode using the back-facing camera that is then hashed into SHA-256 hexadecimal using Guava.
    ScanActivityIntentTest  
    ScanActivityTest  
    SearchFragment
    Fragment for searching for players and QR codes Allows user to look up players based on their exact username Allows user to look up QR codes based on the users current location
    SearchFragmentTest  
    SearchPlayerTest
    Testing Class to the functionality of searching for a User
    SignUpActivity  
    SignUpActivityTest
